content:
Was there something changed crates.io relating to downloads? I see a significant (~4x) jump in daily downloads starting January 4. This appears to primarily affect the most recent version of a crate for some reason.

If there wasn't a change, what on earth is causing such a large jump?
See also #wg-secure-code > Mystery crates.io download spike

Definitely not just a "return from the holidays" spike. Time 0.3 jumped to 140-150k downloads/day by itself, compared to everything else previously being 120k combined. Older versions saw a similar spike.
CI seems possible, but what project would cause such a large change in CI usage? Feels clandestine to an extent.
3 ips were downloading the same crate over and over again
we blocked them as they represented half of the crates.io traffic :upside_down:
but hey it was nice to know we can handle double the traffic without breaking a sweat
@Pietro Albini Same crate and all its dependencies, or just the same crate?
so the spike on rand/serde/etc is from that
